ygData.subject: Hail All!
ygData.msgSnippet: I just wanted to introduce myself to the list.  My main character is a 4th level Human Necromancer on Solusek Ro (Craelius), and I also have a 6th Level
ygData.messageBody:
I just wanted to introduce myself to the list. My main character is a 4th
level Human Necromancer on Solusek Ro (Craelius), and I also have a 6th
Level Erudite Necro on Fennin Ro (Noklaus) whom I don't use often anymore.
Noklaus just wasn't turning out to be the character I wanted, so I started
over and think that Craelius has a long, evil life ahead of him.

Hopefull when the time comes we will meet in Norrath and destroy all
do-gooders in the land.

Eric
